attributes.action: Rethink and redesign the Coroners and Justice Bill to remove the idea of banning lolicon
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lolicon (japanese artwork including explicit acts of those under 18) is just that, artwork. This is a massive part of japanese culture and removing this would be as great of impact to the free speech of britan as removing all references to the Statue of David and other age-old paintings. If there is no victim, as which is the case with japanese art, surely there can be no crime of which to charge someone with.
